text: A Change of Seasons is a 1980 comedy drama movie starring Anthony Hopkins, Shirley MacLaine, Bo Derek, Mary Beth Hurt and Michael Brandon. It was directed by Stephen Frears and written by Erich Segal and was nominated for three Razzies at the 1st Golden Raspberry Awards in 1981. The movie is rated R18 in New Zealand. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * Category:1980 romance movies Category:1980 comedy-drama movies Category:1980 romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Stephen Frears Category:Movies set in Massachusetts
title: A Change of Seasons (movie)
